animations.name: Fade In
animations.css: .fade-in { animation: fadeIn 0.7s ease-in-out; } @keyframes fadeIn { 0% { opacity: 0; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Fade Out
animations.css: .fade-out { animation: fadeOut 0.7s ease-in-out; } @keyframes fadeOut { 0% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Wave Background
animations.css: .bg-wave { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff00ff, #0000ff); animation: waveMove 3s infinite alternate; } @keyframes waveMove { 0% { background-position: left; } 100% { background-position: right; } }

animations.name: Shake
animations.css: .shake { animation: shake 0.5s infinite alternate; } @keyframes shake { 0% { transform: translateX(-5px); } 100% { transform: translateX(5px); } }
